metadata.synopsis: Single dialog with S_Elfsong_Patron_007 (Clovia Throaks) in the Taproom of Elfsong Tavern.

0.speaker: Clovia Throaks
0.text: Welcome, stranger! If you were hoping to get some of the Elfsong's famous plum rhum, too bad - I just drank the last of it!

1.speaker: Clovia Throaks
1.text: I wonder if they've got any plum rhum down at the Mermaid? I know! I'll check the shebeen in the Guildhall.
